name: Hentai Day - Ringsel in Troubles
description:
Ringsel is in trouble, can you help her with her daily 'activities'?

Twelve months - Twelve themes - 5 activities per month - 3 modes
Earn $$$ to use bonuses or to skip some activities.
More than 100 HD pictures to unlock in the Gallery
SLIDESHOW mode to watch all your rewards with your hands free...
20 In-game achievements
Download your favorite pictures for future purposes...

All arts by Ringsel.
